KataDef.name: Breath of Wind Style
KataDef.Description: Your initiative Score increases by 2 during the Reactions Stage of each Combat Round. This effect stacks but disappears immediately if the kata is no longer in effect

KataDef.name: Striking as Air
KataDef.Description: When in the Defense Stance your Armor TN is increased by your Air Ring

KataDef.name: Hidden Blade Style
KataDef.Description: Your Disarm attacks deal normal damage rather than 2k1. You may not increase your damage on these attacks via Raises (including from use of the Feint Maneuver)

KataDef.name: Iron Forest Style
KataDef.Description: While using a spear or polearm, you may use your Air Ring instead of Agility for attack rolls

KataDef.name: Veiled Menace Style
KataDef.Description: Once per turn, you may add your Stealth Skill Rank to your Armor TN for a single attack

KataDef.name: Iron in the Mountains Style
KataDef.Description: You may use your Earth Ring in place of your Air Ring for the Defense Stance

KataDef.name: Striking as Earth
KataDef.Description: When in the Full Defense Stance you gain Reduction equal to your Earth Ring. This is cumulative with other forms of Reduction

KataDef.name: Indomitable Warrior Style
KataDef.Description: Reduce your TN penalties from Wound Ranks by your Earth Ring

KataDef.name: Striking as Fire
KataDef.Description: When in the Full Attack Stance you may add your Fire Ring to the total of one attack roll made per round

KataDef.name: Disappearing World Style
KataDef.Description: Choose one opponent. Once per turn against that opponent, you may use your Agility trait instead of your Strength Trait for damage rolls.

KataDef.name: Reckless Abandon Style
KataDef.Description: You may add your Fire Ring to your Armor TN while in the Full Attack Stance

KataDef.name: Spinning Blades Style
KataDef.Description: Once per turn while wielding a weapon in each hand, you may make the Extra Attack Maneuver for 3 Raises instead of 5. The second attack comes from your off-hand weapon, dealing weapon damage as appropriate. You may not increase your damage on either attack via Raises

KataDef.name: Balance The Elements Style
KataDef.Description: You may use your Void Ring in place of your Reflexes for your Initiative roll

KataDef.name: Striking as Void
KataDef.Description: When in the Center Stance your Armor TN is increased by your Void Ring

KataDef.name: Strength Of Purity Style
KataDef.Description: Once per turn while rolling damage, you may roll your Honor Rank instead of the normal Strength + DF of the weapon. You keep dice equal to the DR of the weapon as usual.

KataDef.name: Strength In Arms Style
KataDef.Description: Once per Turn while wielding a Heavy Weapon, you may use your Strength Trait instead of your Agility for an attack roll

KataDef.name: Striking as Water
KataDef.Description: When in the Attack Stance you may move 5 additional feet as a Free Action
